Class FantasySelectionRules

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.soton.fpl.db.FantasySelectionRules

  • public class FantasySelectionRules
extends java.lang.Object
    Rules relating to squad selection and transfers.
    Author:
    Tim Matthews

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int calculateSellProfit(int iBuyPrice, int iCurrentPrice) 
      boolean doesUseCaptain()
      Whether the vendor allows competitors to assign a captain who scores double points
      boolean doesUseViceCaptain()
      Whether the vendor allows competitors to assign a vice-captain who scores double points if the captain does not appear
      int getBudget()
      How much money is available to spend at the start of the fantasy game
      int getExcessTransferPenalty()
      The number of points the manager is penalised for making transfers beyond the amount permitted.
      int getPlayersPerClubMax()
      The number of players allowed per club
      double getSellPriceProfitProportion()
      The proportion of the profit the manager is given when selling a player For instance, if a player is bought at 10m and sold at 15m and the profit proportion is 0.5, the manager will be given 2.5m
      int getSquadPositionMax(FantasyPositionE ePos)

      int getUnusedFreeTransfersBonus() 
      boolean usesAutoSubs()
      Whether substitutes are brought on for players in the manager's starting team who do not appear
